letter.paragraph: I have been reading your ideas concerning nature of librarianship, and I find them very intriguing. I would love the opportunity to discuss with you the role of the card catalog in today's libraries considering the advent to World Wide Web. Specifically, how are things like Google and Amazon.com changing our patrons' expectations of library services? Mr. Cutter and I will be discussing these ideas at the next Annual Meeting, and we are available at the follow dates/times:
We hope you can join us.
